summary: Retrospective documentary about the making of the horror cult classic "The Return of the Living Dead."
cast: Jules Brenner|Don Calfa|James Dalesandro|J. Trevor Edmond|Tony Gardner|Clu Gulager|Graham Henderson|Steve Johnson|James Karen|Thom Mathews|Kenny Myers|Miguel A. Núñez Jr.|Dan O'Bannon|Brian Peck|John Penney|John Philbin|Linnea Quigley|Beverly Randolph|John A. Russo|Paul Sammon|Viva Sex|Jewel Shepard|Suzanne Snyder|Stanzi Stokes|William Stout|Stacey Swain|Allan Trautman|Brian Yuzna
title: More Brains! A Return to the Living Dead
